title: Lazada - Online Shopping & Deals
description:
Welcome to the brand new Lazada™ mobile app! Join over 140 million shoppers on Lazada™ for the best online shopping experience on mobile. Download and shop now to discover the best of Lazada™ everyday with:
Shop from Home, Shop Safely with Lazada!
DAILY FLASH SALES & VOUCHERS
Save more with exclusive app-only offers, promo codes, and discounts at the best prices, updated every day.
NEW USER BENEFITS
Explore great benefits, exclusive to the new app users. Get vouchers when you play games with the Lazada app and earn more offers along the way! Also, get a free gift with a voucher on the app, once installed on your mobile device.
PERSONALIZED RECOMMENDATIONS
Shopping made easy with personalized products, categories, and official brands at best prices; tailored to your interests, delivered right on your doorstep.
OFFICIAL STORES DESTINATION
Shop the diverse range of world’s leading brands at your fingertips, including Casio, adidas, Maybelline, L’Oréal, Huggies, Olay, Mamypoko, Unilever, Nestle, P&G, Herschel, Ray-Ban, i2i, Pampers, and much more
CATEGORIES
Enjoy hassle-free online shopping and home delivery for a huge variety of products in electronics, sports, beauty, digital, groceries, toys, motorcycles, pets, shoes, fragrances, health, men’s fashion, women’s fashion, Mother & Baby, and much more.
BUYER GUARANTEE
Get your money's worth with Lazada's trusted products, tried and tested by fellow customers with their reliable reviews and ratings. Check out their product reviews, see the seller ratings, and interact with sellers directly! Dissatisfied? Simply return for a full refund via the simple returns policy.
SECURE PAYMENT
Pay securely through multiple payment options available. Cash on Delivery, Lazada™ Installments, and LAZ Wallet all offered by the online app service. You can also avail for cashback benefits and exclusive discounts when you pay using these secured channels.
App Highlights
- App-Exclusive Notifications for Daily Offers, Deals, & Discounts
- Personalized Recommendations of Products, Categories, & Brands
- Full-scale Search Filters by Category, Brand, Price, Rating, Color, and More
- Customer Ratings & Reviews
- Q&A for Direct Customer – Seller Interaction
- Order Tracking
- Fast Shipping
- Log-in via Facebook and Google
- Sharing via Facebook, Twitter, Google+ and more
***Trusted Online Shopping Destination in Southeast Asia!***
Countries supported
Indonesia, Malaysia, Philippines, Singapore, Thailand, and Vietnam
*DISCLAIMER*
Recently, we’ve been notified of several cases where our app is promoted fraudulently by some third-party advertisers, usually in the form of site redirection, fake vouchers and games. These types of ads are being promoted without our consent and we strictly condemn this type of behavior.
If you encounter any of these issues, please help us and copy the page URL found and report it to help@lazada.com with subject AAV so that we can put an end to this.
